id.description: The unique identifier of the coupon.

date_created.description: The date when the coupon was created.

date_created_gmt.description: The date when the coupon was created in GMT.

date_modified.description: The date when the coupon was last modified.

date_modified_gmt.description: The date when the coupon was last modified in GMT.

discount_type.description: The type of discount (fixed or percentage).

date_expires.description: The expiration date of the coupon.

date_expires_gmt.description: The expiration date of the coupon in GMT.

usage_count.description: Number of times the coupon has been used.

individual_use.description: Flag to restrict the coupon to individual use only.

product_ids.description: Product IDs the coupon applies to.

excluded_product_ids.description: Product IDs excluded from the coupon.

usage_limit.description: Total number of times the coupon can be used.

usage_limit_per_user.description: Number of times the coupon can be used per user.

limit_usage_to_x_items.description: Number of items the coupon can be applied to.

free_shipping.description: Flag indicating if free shipping is included with the coupon.

product_categories.description: Product categories the coupon applies to.

excluded_product_categories.description: Product categories excluded from the coupon.

exclude_sale_items.description: Flag to exclude sale items from the coupon.

minimum_amount.description: Minimum amount required to apply the coupon.

maximum_amount.description: Maximum amount allowed to be discounted.

email_restrictions.description: Email addresses restricted from using the coupon.

used_by.description: Users who have used the coupon.

meta_data.description: Additional metadata related to the coupon.

shop_url.description: URL of the shop associated with the coupon.
